steps.name: As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should display success message in FD Section
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should navigate to Instant Swap page
It should navigate to Buy page
It should navigate to trading page
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should display as 'Thank you! We will be calling you shortly'
Schedule Call should navigate to meeting book page
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should also display message as 'Your request has been initiated, You will receive an update on registered e-mail, after confirmation from the blockchain'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should also display message as 'Your loan request is complete, and the tokens have been deposited in your wallet.'

elements.name: #8) Wallet - Pay Back Loan using Crypto

steps.name: As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Pay back option selected as default
It should also display message as 'Your Payment is Successful and your loan is closed!'

elements.name: #9) Wallet - Pay Back Loan using Collateral

steps.name: As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Click on Close loan using Collateral option
It should display the amount to be deducted and refunded
It should also display message as 'Your request to close the loan with collateral is in progress and will be processed shortly!'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should also display message as 'Add-on loan has been disbursed to your account successfully!'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should also display message as 'Collateral has been added for this loan successfully!'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should also display message as 'Collateral has been unlocked successfully!'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Deposit Via RTGS option is selected as default
It also display message as 'Your INR Balance Will Be Updated In The Next 4 Hours, Once The Transaction Is Verified'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It also display message as 'Your INR Balance Will Be Updated In The Next 4 Hours, Once The Transaction Is Verified'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
It should display message as 'Your withdrawal amount will be instantly transferred to the selected bank account / UPI ID'
It should also display message as 'Withdrawal request submitted!'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Advance Option button should be disabled
It should also display 'Your Fixed Deposit has been created'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Check Principal & Interest option is selected
It should also display 'Your Fixed Deposit has been created'

elements.name: #19) Fixed Deposit - Auto Renew ON - Principal Only

steps.name: As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Check Principal Only option is selected
It should also display 'Your Fixed Deposit has been created'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
Check and Click on Proceed Button
It should display as well 'Your order has been executed.'
As a existing Vauld user in Dashboard page
